abstract: The deal includes technology transfers that will help the country build advanced combat aircraft of its own.
snippet: The deal includes technology transfers that will help the country build advanced combat aircraft of its own.
lead_paragraph: SEOUL, South Korea — South Korea formally announced on Wednesday that it would buy 40 F-35A fighter jets from the American defense contractor Lockheed Martin in a deal that includes transfers of technology for the development of the country’s own advanced fighter jet.

headline.main: South Korea Formally Announces Intent to Buy 40 Lockheed Fighter Jets
